value:
Ever since I arrived, people keep
mistaking me for some monk. Do
we really look that much alike?

I've lived my life as a wanderer. I
don't put down roots.

With all these Heroes, you'd think
someone else might be called Kamui
too. But I guess not.

Might be nice to settle down one
day and make a safe haven for other
mercs with no place to go.

Valbar's a guy who sees things as
they are. If he already sized you up,
then we should be good to go.

I'm Kamui, a wandering mercenary.
At the moment, I swing my blade for
$Nf.

Hiring me was the right choice.
Go on, say it!

You know how to keep me busy!
No complaints, though. More work,
more pay!
Well, that wasn't worth it.
This job has some perks!

I'm Kamui, a wandering mercenary.
So you're my new boss? I'll make
sure you aren't wasting your money.

I was born a wanderer. I've seen my
share of kingdoms, and more than
my share of battlefields.$k$pThis, though, is my first time in a
new world. Never thought I'd end up
somewhere my feet can't carry me.$k$pBelieve me when I say that Askr is
one of the better places I've been.
Just look at everybody! All smiles.$k$pAnd listen to them too. These Heroes
have vowed to defend this kingdom
with their lives. I can see why.$k$pBut most important is the fact that
there are precisely zero
necrodragons. I'll miss this place...$k$pYes, I'll be on my way sooner or
later, but work comes first. The
peace of Askr is at stake!
Wanna try that again?
Say good night!
Nice try! How 'bout this?!
I'm just in it for the money.
Is this...where it ends?
The name's Kamui. I'll work for whoever is willing to pay me.
Huh? Stop kidding around, I'm trying to relax here.
*yawn* What? You need something done? Sure, I'm on it...
This job you need done: we won't be running into any necrodragons, right? Right?
Valbar was all right as far as employers go. I wonder how you'll fare.
When I finally return home, I may just consider settling down for good.
I'm a bit of a wanderer, so I'm used to being away from home. I guess you could say I've enjoyed my time here.
Sure.
Keep it moving.
All right, all right.
